summary: When DEA agents are taken captive by a ruthless South American kingpin, the Delta Force is reunited to rescue them in this sequel to the 1986 film.
cast: Chuck Norris|Billy Drago|John P. Ryan|Richard Jaeckel|Begonya Plaza|Paul Perri|Héctor Mercado|Mark Margolis|Mateo Gómez|Ruth de Sosa|Gerald Castillo|Geoff Brewer|Rick Prieto|Sharlene Ross|Michael Heit|Dick Warlock|Chris Castillejo|Dave Brodett|Rina Reyes|Subas Herrero|Ronnie Lazaro|Miguel Faustmann|Kevin Kleppe|Mimi Sananes Wilheim|Jeff Hammett|Kelly Wicker|Trevor Kunz|Ruel Vernal|Roland Dantes|Roldan Aquino|Cris Aguilar|Reynaldo Guiao Jr.|Alberto Domínguez|Craig Judd|Michael Welborn|Roy Judd|Luis Del Castillo III|Eric Hahn|Jaime Miguel|Curtis Carter|Pita Liboro|Augusto Victa|Greg Hackbarth|Jerry Lapuz|Carlos Terry|Alan Vafides|Mike Warbis|Colin Massey|Steve Brown|Nils Cruz|Dan Furnad|Peter Lindsay|Andre Del Amo|Michael Myracle|Bill Campbell|Joe Collins|Thomas Davidson|Jim Dixon|Ever Etafo|Ramin Houmayoun|Ned Hourani|Peter Ladkani|Tom Leith|Hakan Losnitz|Jon Mosher|Peter Norlin|Andrew Siegenthaler|Mike Silva|Berto Spoor|Don Wilson|Robert Denny|Najid Jadali|Mike Reynolds
title: Delta Force 2
